title: Cracking the stone age code
creator_credit: David Collison, Paul Johnstone and BBC-TV
brief_description: Examines the work of Alexander Thom, former professor of engineering science at Oxford, whose investigations into stone circles and standing circles of Britain threaten to upset prehistoric knowledge. We see him at work in Scotland, and then go to Britain to see how his findings apply there.
